name: blobcats! beta
description:
this is blobcats. a game where you have to collect fruit, and eat them until you cant eat the fruits no more and have to explode so you can be your normal size. 

controls: 

aswd: walk 

T:taunt 

and click the squares in the corner for options or achievements. 

this game was made for kniteblargh on gamejolt,

 here is his  profile: https://gamejolt.com/@KniteBlargh   

and this game was made by gallixyydev (or gallixyy for short) 

link to gamejolt profile: gamejolt.com/invite/Gallixyyishere

ok bye!
